sense.def:
The base of something
je najnižji rob ali del nečesa ali pa del, ki je pripet na kaj drugega.

seg.quote: ...the scar at the base of his thumb.

sense.def:
Položaj tistega, kar je
a base for something
, omogoči, da se lahko nekaj razvije ali doseže.

seg.quote: This innovation was regarded as a sensible base for teaching and research.
The League had no real power base on which it could build.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
based on something
, se je iz tistega razvilo.

seg.quote: The new agreement is based on the original United Nations proposal.

sense.def:
To be based in a particular place
pomeni, da v nekem kraju živimo ali opravimo večino dela.

A military base
je kraj, od koder izvaja akcije del kopenske vojske, mornarice ali letalstva.

seg.quote: The submarines abandoned the chase and returned to base.

sense.def:
One's base
je kraj, kjer človek večinoma dela, stanuje ali živi.

seg.quote: The company made Luxembourg city their base.
